channel.title: Disconection and no one can join :s
channel.description: Hello Lately i have been adding lots of npc's/updates to my 517 server there is usally 0 dc's and pretty much no lag. today and yesterday i could usally leave my server on for 24 hours+ with out it dc'ing. i am using a vps there has been heaps of disconnections and after a while people just cant join? ive tryed using a server restarter but i cant seem to get it to open on my vps please help

item.title: Disconection and no one can join :s
item.dc:creator: @Nz_skillz123 Nz skillz123
item.description:
@Nz_skillz123 wrote:

I have added about 10 borks and moved 2 tds and completely deleted tzharr noobs

Bourght a new vps might change things

Read full topic

today and yesterday i could usally leave my server on for 24 hours+ with out it dc’ing. i am using a vps
